channel.title: minecraft on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in minecraft on Barefoot Rob

item.title: minecraft undersea monster room
item.description: 20:07 Sunday 22 April 2018 JST I decided to recreate this reverse fishtank in Minecraft, but for some reason it is all dark when I view it from the outside. Not sure how to make the underwater view look lighter. I created the tank using a fill command, decided to expand it, and made a huge area… I think the command was something like this /fill 4000 46 -5000 4050 50 -4800 glass_blocks 0 hollow Then I carpeted the area with grass using something like this

item.title: マインクラフト
item.description: 17:37 Wednesday 17 January 2018 JST 時々ときどきマインクラフトと 言いうゲームで遊あそ んでます。なんでこのゲームが好す きなのかはゲームの中なか で子供こどもの時とき の夢ゆめを作 つくれるからです。木き の上うえに家 いえが欲ほしかった ら、どうず作つくって下く ださい。海うみの 下したにグラス屋根 やねの人参にんじんの 農場のうじょう？これも作 つくれます。山やま の間あいだにグラスの水 みずの滑すべり 台だいがいいな。大丈夫 だいじょうぶです。 Sometimes I play the game Minecraft. Why do I like this game? In the game, I can create my childhood dreams. Want a house in tree? Go ahead and make it! Want a glass roofed carrot farm in the bottom of the ocean? Go head; you can make it.

item.title: doge.bitquest.co
item.description: 20:43 Saturday 13 January 2018 JST I discovered that Bitquest now has a Doge server. I jumped on and added 25 Doge to my wallet there. dognamedsteve helped me by getting me started with a compass, diamond pick, diamond shovel, chestplate and some other basic gear. Nice! I started digging a burrow after walking off the end of a road near a heart-looking room up in the trees.

item.title: minecraft
item.description: 07:10 Sunday 07 February 2016 JST I donated to the Delta Minecraft admins, to thank them for keeping it going.

item.title: minecraft with Fred
item.description: 00:45 Wednesday 27 January 2016 CST Yay! Fred and I have finally played on the Minecraft (local) server that I’ve been working on for well over a year. It’s a lot harder when I’m in gamemode 0! (that’s zero, not one.) We’ve barely gotten started seeing stuff, mostly just trying to stay alive for a single night while monsters try to kill us. Creepers have exploded on my garden, and in the middle of my front yard.

item.title: Minecraft
item.description: 23:26 Sunday 03 January 2016 JST Minecraft made some neat edges between Chicago and the mainland. I then used MCEdit to delete some chunks which were then recreated in game. Interesting results resulted.

item.title: added Chicago to my Minecraft map
item.description: 20:51 Thursday 31 December 2015 JST Huge props to whomever created a scale model of Chicago in Minecraft. I tried to make a single .schematic file to import the entire map, but it didn’t work.. probably too big for MCEdit. So I broke it up in to 7 8 schematics. The eighth is but a sliver between the 6th and 7th. Though I highly doubt anyone will care, it’s relatively trivial to archive them online.

item.title: Blew up roller coaster
item.description: 14:12 Monday 30 November 2015 JST D’oh! HAhaha I tried out survival mode after giving myself a kick ass diamond sword and 32 spawned skeletons. They nearly killed me, and then a creeper finished me off, plus destroyed a small section of roller coaster. hahah oops! I think I repaired it in a way that all the previously linked tracks are linked again. I tested one track and it seemed correct.

item.title: Minecraft for Fred on 14 November
item.description:
19:53 Saturday 14 November 2015 JST Interesting! Today while reviewing the world I set up for Fred, I found a note I left for him 1 year ago, to the day.
In other news, I made an underwater glass tunnel

item.title: Been playing minecraft a bit
item.description: 21:46 Monday 09 November 2015 JST But before I post pictures, I’m gonna try doing something that was actually on my todo list. 11:17 Tuesday 10 November 2015 JST

item.title: Old Minecraft pics
item.description: ##19:02 Wednesday 14 January 2015 JST## These are from about a year ago, when I was playing on my second Delta server map.

item.title: Hour of Minecraft
item.description: ##23:09 Tuesday 13 January 2015 JST## I played Minecraft for an hour and a half, during which time someone typed GoT which I recognized must be Game of Thrones, which Fred just suggested I watch. I watched the second episode (after having seen the first yesterday or so).

item.title: up too late
item.description: ##02:56 Thursday 08 January 2015 JST## I was up playing Minecraft a little too late tonight. But I must say the new spawnpoint on Delta is amazing.

item.title: minecraft
item.description:
##10:41 Tuesday 09 December 2014 JST## In Minecraft, I built a frame around the four-way train station I downloaded. For good measure, I put a pool on top. I loaded the pool with squid, but they all died. Poor squid!! Also started working on a waterslide.
Overall, I’m trying to make a really interesting world for Fred to visit when he visits. Hmm also gotta buy minecraft for him for Christmas.

item.title: Minecraft pics
item.description: ##00:01 Saturday 22 November 2014 JST## Screenshots from a week ago:

item.title: Added building to Minecraft world
item.description: ##07:50 Tuesday 18 November 2014 JST## And by add, I mean using MCEdit, I injected an schematic of the Empire State Building (unfinished) by Avalanche_Ali I placed it in the middle of a plain at first, but then thought it would look weirder in a forest, so I put it there instead. Beautifully, without having really tried hard, the minecart track I had built went straight into the center of the building, aligned perfectly.

item.title: /fill command in Minecraft
item.description:
##19:53 Thursday 13 November 2014 JST## Hahaha I got about 1⁄2 finished building tall walls around the pyramid I made for Fred in minecraft before I found the new /fill command.
Boom done!
Doesn’t always work on leaves, though.

item.title: started wall of sand in Minecraft
item.description: ##19:28 Wednesday 05 November 2014 JST## Back when Minefold was in business, I paid them to host a private world for me. They went out of business and I downloaded the world, but couldn’t get it working on my local machine until recently. Since then, I built a relatively long minecart track in the nether put a large portal at the end of it. Delightfully, the overworld portal happened to be quite close to a desert.

item.title: lazy Saturday
item.description: ##22:34 Saturday 20 April 2013 10:34pm Sunday 21 April 2013 (written the next day) Yesterday was similar to today except it was more like minecraft, porn, sleep, eat, porn, minecraft, eat. In minecraft, I’m building a roller coaster or two (using creative mode).

item.title: just purchased 2000 hours on minefold.com
item.description: ##10:25 Saturday 20 April 2013 10:20am Saturday 20 April 2013 I had 24 free hours, and used up 14 in a couple weeks, so that’s an hour per day. 2000 hours should last for 2000 days or until 11 October 2018. For $48 * 2, not so bad. I bought all those hours because today is the last day they are selling “prepaid time” Visit https://minefold.com/ directly, or go through my referral link yayer!

item.title: having a lot of fun playing (too much) Minecraft
item.description:
##21:19 Thursday 06 December 2012
This is a view from inside the hole I’m digging as part of a Minecraft art project I’ve got in mind. I plan to put a stop-action animation of the hole being dug on youtube. Earlier, while researching stuff for work, I found bigdinosaur.org, on which a blog entry was posted about something work related. mySQL or Javascript or some such. Anyway, in the side bar he mentioned he liked Minecraft.
